gantt_today_marker.description: Display vertical line on today's date

parameters.timeline_date: Date for this Gantt chart column

gantt_critical_bar.description: Solid bar for critical tasks, pattern bar for non-critical

parameters.timeline_date: Date for this Gantt chart column
